blueprint.description: Installs fpm (a tool for quickly and easily building packages such as rpms, debs, OSX packages, etc.) on Linux and macOS
blueprint.overview: [fpm](https://github.com/jordansissel/fpm) (short for Effing package management) allows you to build packages for multiple platforms with great ease. The source of your package can be a gem, Python module, pear, directory, .tar.gz, rpm, deb, Node.js package, or pacman package. The target packages it supports are deb, rpm, solaris, freebsd, tar, directory, Mac OS X .pkg file, or pacman package.
blueprint.name: fpm
blueprint.title: fpm
